com.team09.qanda

Class LocalStorageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team09.qanda.LocalStorageHandler

  • public class LocalStorageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all of the logic behind saving things to and getting things from the phone's local storage. Objects are stored as their JSON equivalent string using GSON.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalStorageHandler()
      The constructor initializes Gson to convert objects to saveable strings, as well as an ElasticSearchHandler which is used to refresh the currently saved questions.

                                 QuestionThread qt,
                                 java.lang.String filename,
                                 java.lang.String id_filename)

        qt - The QuestionThread to be deleted
        filename - The file to delete the QuestionThread from
        id_filename - The file to delete the id from

      • saveQuestionThread

        public void saveQuestionThread(Context context,
                               QuestionThread qt,
                               java.lang.String filename)
        Adds a QuestionThread to a ThreadList in local storage
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called
        qt - The QuestionThread to be saved
        filename - The file to save the QuestionThread to

      • saveQuestionThread

        public void saveQuestionThread(Context context,
                               QuestionThread qt,
                               java.lang.String filename,
                               java.lang.String id_filename)
        Adds a QuestionThread to a ThreadList in local storage, as well as its associated id to a separate file. This allows more efficient access to the list of questions saved locally.
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called
        qt - The QuestionThread to be saved
        filename - The file to save the QuestionThread to
        id_filename - The file to save the id to

      • saveQuestionThreads

        public void saveQuestionThreads(Context context,
                                java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> qts,
                                java.lang.String filename)
        Makes a ThreadList from a list of QuestionThreads and saves it to local storage
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called
        qts - The list of QuestionThreads to be saved
        filename - The file to save the ThreadList to

      • saveQuestionThreads

        public void saveQuestionThreads(Context context,
                                java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> qts,
                                java.lang.String filename,
                                java.lang.String id_filename)
        Makes a ThreadList from a list of QuestionThreads and saves it to local storage, as well as saving all of their associated ids to a separate file
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called
        qts - The list of QuestionThreads to be saved
        filename - The file to save the ThreadList to
        id_filename - The file to save the ids to

      • getIds

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getIds(Context context,
                                                    java.lang.String filename)
        Gets a list of ids from local storage. Can be used to check which questions are currently saved. Faster than loading all of the questions
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called
        filename - The file to get the ids from
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of strings

                         java.lang.String username)

      • saveText

        public void saveText(Context context,
                     java.lang.String text,
                     java.lang.String filename)
        Saves a string to local storage. Used to make text boxes persistent
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called
        text - Text to be saved
        filename - The file to save the text to

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText(Context context,
                                java.lang.String filename)
        Gets a string from local storage. Used to set the text of the text boxes
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called
        filename - The file to get the text from
        Returns:
        A string containing the contents of the file

      • refreshLocals

        public void refreshLocals(Context context)
        This method retrieves all of the questions which are in local storage from the server and saves them again to their files. This ensures users have the most current version of their saved questions.
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the method is being called

        public boolean deleteFile(Context context,
                          java.lang.String filename)
